rules_text:
Flying, prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Doll artifact creature token.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
